src_original: abhūvan catvāro maharṣayaḥ satvān hyanukampya āgatāḥ |  krakucchandaḥ konāgamanaḥ kāśyapaḥ śākyamuniḥ ||8 ||

krakucchandakāle manuṣyāyuḥ catvāriṃśadvarṣasahasram ||10 ||  konāgamasya kāle manuṣyāyuḥ triṃśadvarṣasahasram |  kāśyapabuddhakāle manuṣyāyuḥ viṃśadvarṣasahasram |  kāśyapabuddhakāle manuṣyāyuḥ nādhikaṃ śatāt ||11 ||
tathaitarhi mama kāle manuṣyāyuḥ nādhikaṃ śatāt ||
"vipaśyī buddha āgāt kṣatriyaḥ gotreṇa kauṃḍinyaḥ |  śikhī buddhaḥ,
viśvabhū buddho'  krakucchando buddha āsīd brāhmaṇaḥ gotreṇa kāśyapaḥ |
konāgamano buddhaḥ,  kāśyapo buddhaḥ api kulena gotreṇa tathā |
